Class PairHeuristic

  • java.lang.Object
    • PairHeuristic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHeuristic

    class PairHeuristic
extends java.lang.Object
implements IHeuristic
    Class to calculate heuristic based on desired pairs that already exist.
